attributes.action: Stop taking so long after making a decision to then implementing it.
attributes.additional_details: We have recently had a decision that there should be an in/out EU referendum, but we have to wait FOUR years to exercise our right to self determination - Falkland Islanders were granted that right in much less time?  Today a decision was made to scrap the Liverpool Care Pathway because it causes exactly what it was set up to prevent, but it will be phased out over the next 12 months.  Why so long? How many more people are to be subjected to the horrible death the Pathway causes (which is the very reason it is to be scrapped!) over the 12 months it takes to shut it down.  Grow some balls, elected dishonourables, shut it down now, today.
